text: Chung Doo-un (, 6 March 1957 - 16 July 2019) was a South Korean bureaucrat and politician. He was the vice-mayor of Seoul from 2000 to 2003. He was a member of the National Assembly of South Korea from 2004 to 2016. He was a close friend to Lee Myung-bak. He was born in Seoul. Chung killed himself at a Seoul park on 16 July 2019 at the age of 62.Ex-lawmaker Chung Doo-un found dead on Seoul mountain ==References== == Other websites == * Chung Doo-un, Naver Blog * Chung Doo-un, tistory Blog * 음주가무 좋아하는 날라리?
